componentInstanceProperties.name: messageTitle

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: So that D&B can show you a summary of this organisation please match it with the correct entry using the button below. It is important the correct entry is chosen for data accuracy because its information will be used to populate fields on this Account.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: The account is currently being enriched. Please refresh after 5-10 seconds to see D&B's summary.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Opportunities where the Competitor was the Incumbent and OCS won, therefore dislodging the Competitor.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
